info.title: OPERA Cloud Event Configuration API
info.description:
This API caters for Event Configuration in OPERA Cloud.

Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 22.3.

This document and all content within is available under the Universal Permissive License v 1.0 (https://oss.oracle.com/licenses/upl). Copyright (c) 2020, 2023 Oracle and/or its affiliates.

get.description:
Use this API to get Function Space Event Types.

OperationId:getFunctionSpaceEventTypes

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specifies the Event field value description to search.

200.description: Response object of the Function Space Event Types.

post.description:
You can use this API to create menu classes.

OperationId:postCateringMenuClasses

parameters.name: cateringMenuClasses
parameters.description: Requestion object for creating new Menu Classes.

201.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

post.description:
You can use this API to create menu item classes.

OperationId:postCateringMenuItemClasses

parameters.name: cateringMenuItemClasses
parameters.description: Request object for Creating Menu Item Classes.

201.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

get.description:
Get Menu items for a property.

OperationId:getCateringMenuItems

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique OPERA Hotel Id

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Menu item name of string lentgth 30

parameters.name: quickInsertCode
parameters.description: Article number of Menu Item in Caps

parameters.name: inactive
parameters.description: If true this boolean will set the criteria to only return Menu Items configured as Inactive.

200.description: Response object for retrieving Menu Items.

get.description:
Retrieve a list of menus for a property.

OperationId:getCateringMenus

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique OPERA Hotel ID

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

parameters.name: menuId
parameters.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

parameters.name: iDExtension
parameters.description: Additional identifying value assigned by the creating system.

parameters.name: idContext
parameters.description: Used to identify the source of the identifier (e.g., IATA, ABTA).

parameters.name: menuIDType
parameters.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: This type holds name of Menu Class.

parameters.name: menuTypes
parameters.description: Defines values for Menu Type

parameters.name: inactive
parameters.description: If true, only Composed Menu's marked as Inactive in Menu Configuration will be returned.

parameters.name: multiChoice
parameters.description: When selected Only Composed Menu's noted as Multi Choice in Menu Configuration will be returned.

parameters.name: webBookable
parameters.description: Check of Menu if it is web bookable

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The ending value of the date range.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The starting value of the date range.

parameters.name: fetchInstructions
parameters.description: Fetch instructions that can be used in Catering Menus maintenance.

get.description:
This API allows you to Use this API to get Room Type Pool and the associated Room Types.

OperationId:getRoomTypePool

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Flag to indicate if inactive room types should be included.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

parameters.name: physical
parameters.description: Is it a physical sleep room type.

parameters.name: pseudo
parameters.description: Is it a pseudo room type.

parameters.name: summaryInfo
parameters.description: Flag to indicate if summary or detailed information should be fetched.

200.description: Response object for fetch room pool information.

post.description:
This API allows you to Use this API to create Room Type Pools.

OperationId:postRoomTypePool

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: roomTypePoolCriteria
parameters.description: Request object for creating new room pool.

201.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

delete.summary: Delete  Room Type Pool and Mappings
delete.description:
Use this API to delete Room Type Pool and Mappings.

OperationId:removeRoomTypePool

parameters.name: roomPoolCode
parameters.description: Unique Code of room type pool.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of room pool type.

parameters.name: defaultText
parameters.description: Default text with Character length from 0 to 1000.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code for the translation.

parameters.name: sequence
parameters.description: Sequence for representing room type pool record.

parameters.name: inactive
parameters.description: Indicates the room type is inactive or not.

parameters.name: numberOfRooms
parameters.description: Number of rooms for this room type.

parameters.name: roomClass
parameters.description: Room class for the room type code.

parameters.name: shortDescription
parameters.description: Short Description of room type.

parameters.name: activeDate
parameters.description: Active date of the room type.

parameters.name: pseudo
parameters.description: Indicates if room type is pseudo.

parameters.name: accessible
parameters.description: Indicates if room type is accessible.

parameters.name: sendToInterface
parameters.description: Indicates if room type is sent to interface.

parameters.name: sellSequence
parameters.description: Indicates room types sell sequence.

parameters.name: suite
parameters.description: Indicates room type is a suite.

parameters.name: meetingRoom
parameters.description: Indicates room type is meeting room. This Can be Meeting room flag cannot be unmarked at the property level. Can only be marked for non pseudo room types.

parameters.name: restricted
parameters.description: Indicates that the room pool cannot be used to allocate inventory to this room type. Inventory must be allocated directly to the room type itself.

200.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

put.description:
Use this API to update Room Type Pool and Associated Room Types.

OperationId:changeRoomTypePool

parameters.name: roomPoolCode
parameters.description: Unique Code of room type pool.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: roomTypePoolToBeChanged
parameters.description: Request object for changing existing room pool.

200.description: Existing Operations Responses will eventually be modified to be extended from this type.

authKey.name: authorization
authKey.description: Bearer token that needs to be passed which is generated post user authentication

x-hotelid.name: x-hotelid
x-hotelid.description: Mandatory parameter to identify the hotel code where the end user is logged in

x-hubid.name: x-hubid
x-hubid.description: x-hubid is a logical grouping of multiple properties that allows api consumers to manage data from a group of properties. This x-hubid is a valid list of hub codes configured in OPERA to which the user has access. Rest APIs without hotelId in the operation path can support hub level integration using x-hubid

uniqueID_Type.description: An identifier used to uniquely reference an object in a system (e.g. an airline reservation reference, customer profile reference, booking confirmation number, or a reference to a previous availability quote).

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

dateRangeType.description: Date Range with Start and End dates.

start.description: The starting value of the date range.

end.description: The ending value of the date range.

instanceLink.description: Metadata describing link description objects that MAY appear in the JSON instance representation.

href.description: URI [RFC3986] or URI Template [RFC6570]. If the value is set to URI Template, then the "templated" property must be set to true.

rel.description: Name of the link relation that, in addition to the type property, can be used to retrieve link details. For example, href or profile.

templated.description: Boolean flag that specifies that "href" property is a URI or URI Template. If the property is a URI template, set this value to true. By default, this value is false.

method.description: HTTP method for requesting the target of the link.

targetSchema.description: Link to the metadata of the resource, such as JSON-schema, that describes the resource expected when dereferencing the target resource..

operationId.description: The operationId of the path you can call to follow this link.  This allows you to look up not only the path and method, but the description of that path and any parameters you need to supply.

title.description: Exact copy of the "summary" field on the linked operation.

warningsType.description: Used in conjunction with the Success element to define a business error.

warningType.description: Used when a message has been successfully processed to report any warnings or business errors that occurred.

shortText.description: An abbreviated version of the error in textual format.

code.description: If present, this refers to a table of coded values exchanged between applications to identify errors or warnings.

docURL.description: If present, this URL refers to an online description of the error that occurred.

status.description: If present, recommended values are those enumerated in the ErrorRS, (NotProcessed Incomplete Complete Unknown) however, the data type is designated as string data, recognizing that trading partners may identify additional status conditions not included in the enumeration.

tag.description: If present, this attribute may identify an unknown or misspelled tag that caused an error in processing. It is recommended that the Tag attribute use XPath notation to identify the location of a tag in the event that more than one tag of the same name is present in the document. Alternatively, the tag name alone can be used to identify missing data [Type=ReqFieldMissing].

recordId.description: If present, this attribute allows for batch processing and the identification of the record that failed amongst a group of records. This value may contain a concatenation of a unique failed transaction ID with specific record(s) associated with that transaction.

type.description: The Warning element MUST contain the Type attribute that uses a recommended set of values to indicate the warning type. The validating XSD can expect to accept values that it has NOT been explicitly coded for and process them by using Type ="Unknown".

rph.description: Reference Place Holder used as an index for this warning.

status.description: Existing Operations Responses will eventually be modified to be extended from this type.

exceptionDetailType.title: Error Detail
exceptionDetailType.description: Complex type that contains error details for a REST call.

type.description: Absolute URI [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide a human-readable summary of the problem (for example, using HTML).

title.description: Short, human-readable summary of the problem.  The summary SHOULD NOT change for subsequent occurrences of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

status.description: HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem, set by the origin server.

detail.description: Human-readable description specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: Absolute URI that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.  It may or may not provide additional information if dereferenced.

o:errorCode.description: Application error code, which is different from HTTP error code.

o:errorPath.description: Path to the problem at the resource or property level.

o:errorDetails.description: Details of the error message, consisting of a hierarchical tree structure.

errorInstance.title: Error Instance Details
errorInstance.description: Complex type that contains error instance details for a REST call.

type.description: Absolute URI [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide a human-readable summary of the problem (for example, using HTML).

title.description: Short, human-readable summary of the problem.  The summary SHOULD NOT change for subsequent occurrences of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

status.description: HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem, set by the origin server.

detail.description: Human-readable description specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: Absolute URI that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.  It may or may not provide additional information if dereferenced.

o:errorCode.description: Application error code, which is different from HTTP error code.

o:errorPath.description: Path to the problem at the resource or property level.

value.description: Used for Character Strings, length 0 to 2000.

functionSpaceEventTypesDetails.description: Response object of the Function Space Event Types.

eventTypes.description: Retrieve the collection of the Function Space Event Types based on the search criteria

eventTypeCode.description: Code Field Value belongs to the Event Type.

translatableDescription.description: Translatable description to elaborate the Event Code Type.

description.description: Description to elaborate the Event Code Type.

timeWindow.description: Default Start Time and End Time of the event.

inactive.description: Determines the event type status as active or inactive

mealType.description: Meal type associated with the event type.

coverable.description: Indicates if Event Type is coverable or not.

webBookable.description: Defines if web booking is allowed or not.

sequence.description: The sequence number of the event.

translationTextType50.description: Contains Multiple translated texts and language codes.

defaultText.description: Default text with Character length from 0 to 50.

translatedTexts.description: List of translated text and language codes.

timeWindowType.description: Defines a Time period with start time and an end time.

startTime.description: Start Time of the Time window.

endTime.description: End Time of the Time window.

cateringMenuClasses.description: Request object for changing Menu Classes.

cateringMenuClassType.description: Catering Menu Class which holds the value of menu class.

classId.description: This type holds Menu Class id.

hotelId.description: The Hotel code which the menu class belongs to.

classInfo.description: This type holds Menu class details.

menuList.description: This type holds list of menu, along with the menu info,revenue and menu details.

name.description: This type holds name of Menu Class.

webBookable.description: This type tells about whether menu class is book through web or not.

eventTypes.description: This type holds list of associated events.

inactive.description: Return true, when this Menu Item Class will not be available to be associated to a Catering Event.

classId.description: This type holds class id for given menu.

hotelId.description: The Hotel code which the catering menu belongs to.

info.description: This type holds value of Catering Menu Info.

menuDetailList.description: This type holds Menu Detail List.

menuNoteList.description: Collection of notes which belongs to a Menu.

className.description: This type holds name of Menu Class Name.

name.description: This type holds name of Menu Name.

restriction.description: This type holds Restrictionn for the given Menu.

description.description: This type holds Description for the given Menu.

dietaryList.description: This type holds DietaryList values for the given Menu.

eventTypes.description: This type holds Event list associated with menu.

type.description: This type holds value of Menu type FOOD ,BEVERAGE for the given Menu.

quickInsertCode.description: This type holds quick insert value, v5 functionality as Article Number for the Menu.

servingType.description: This type holds serving type value per person , per table for the given Menu.

servingSize.description: This type holds TableCapacity for the given Menu.

includedInMenu.description: Return true, when all Menu Items added will be marked as Included and there will be a Global Price for this menu

consumptionBased.description: This type holds value of consumption, Menu items will be charged on a consumption basis.

sellDateRange.description: Menu will be available to sell for an Event for date range.

eventDateRange.description: Date period which the Event will take place.

menusSold.description: The total number of menus sold for the day on which the event takes place.

webBookable.description: This type tells about whether menu is book through web or not.

inactive.description: Selection will note this Menu is Inactive and unable to be added to a Catering Event.

salesPrice.description: Sales Price for Menu Item in Menu Item Configuration.

includedInPrice.description: Return true means, menu item as Included in the Menu Price

multiChoice.description: Indicator of this being a multi-choice menu

courseCount.description: Define the Courses populated into the Multi Choice Menu Configuration

translationTextType2000.description: Contains Multiple translated texts and language codes.

defaultText.description: Default text with Character length from 0 to 2000.

translatedTexts.description: List of translated text and language codes.

currencyAmountType.description: A monetary value expressed with a currency code.

currencyCode.description: Provides a currency code to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.

type.description: This type holds value of Menu type FOOD ,BEVERAGE for the given Menu.

cost.description: This type holds cost of the Menu.

internalQuote.description: This type holds internal quote for the Menu.

costMargin.description: This type holds cost of the Menu.

price.description: This type holds Price of the Menu.

priceMargin.description: This type holds price margin for the given Menu.

cateringMenuDetailListType.description: List of Values of Catering Menu Detail.

id.description: The menu item class unique ID

hotelId.description: The Hotel code which the menu item class belongs to

classInfo.description: Displays the Menu Item Name noted in the Menu Item Configuration.

displayOrder.description: Defines the Display Order of the menu item class, to which the menu item is attached

name1.description: First value of menu item which belongs to a menu item class

name2.description: Seond value of menu item which belongs to a menu item class

name3.description: Third value of menu item which belongs to a menu item class

origin1.description: The values entered here most commonly reference a Wine, Meat origin if Restaurant features a Local Farm

origin2.description: The values entered here most commonly reference a Wine, Meat origin if Restaurant features a Local Farm

custom.description: Indicates whether this menu item is custom

year.description: This value is typically the year of the Wine

restriction.description: Any particular restriction description in 100 charactera

description.description: Detailed description of menu items in 100 characters

eventTypes.description: Field will be inherited values from the Menu Item Class associated for Event Types.

responsibleDepartments.description: Department Code(s) will be displayed in the field for a particular menu item

quickInsertCode.description: Article number in Caps of menu item

salesPrice.description: Price of Menu Item , Numeric currency value field conforming to Currency Format for the selected Property.

itemConsumption.description: Selection of this notes that the price defined is charged 'as-consumed' basis

container.description: Code and description of the container to be used by Menu Item

servings.description: Numeric value of servings of Menu item

webBookable.description: Check of Menu Item if it is web bookable

print.description: check if Print action is required for menu item

inactive.description: Check for the status of menu item

course.description: Course number defined will be the display order of the Menu Items on the screen and in Banquet Event Order.

menuName.description: Holds the value of Menu name.

includedMenu.description: Return true means, menu as Included in the Menu Price

mandatory.description: Return true means, menu as Included in the Menu Price

codeDescriptionType.description: This contains a generic code and description information.

dietaryPrefType.description: Base type provides information about Catering Revenue Types Configuration.

cateringMultiChoiceMenuListType.description: This type holds Multi choice Menu.

course.description: This type holds Courses are defined for Menu.

choiceCount.description: This type holds choice count of the Menu.

courseDescription.description: This type holds choice description for Menu.

courseName.description: This type holds name of the Course.

translationTextType100.description: Contains Multiple translated texts and language codes.

defaultText.description: Default text with Character length from 0 to 100.

translatedTexts.description: List of translated text and language codes.

translationTextType20.description: Contains Multiple translated texts and language codes.

defaultText.description: Default text with Character length from 0 to 20.

translatedTexts.description: List of translated text and language codes.

eventResourceNoteType.description: Contains the event resource's note information.

noteId.description: Unique identifier for event resource note. If it is missing, this indicate that it is a new note. If only NoteID is provided then it is a delete operation

internal.description: Indicates if the note is internal use only.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee resposible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

purgeDate.description: Date an item will be purged from a database (e.g., from a live database to an archive).

menuItemClasses.description: Menu Item Classes to be changed.

id.description: The menu item class unique ID

itemClassInfo.description: The menu item class detailed info

itemList.description: The menu items detailed attribute which belongs to particular menu item class

eventTypeList.description: Event types associated with the Menu Class

menuType.description: Menu Type information, it is either Beverage or Food

webBookable.description: Boolean value indicates whether the Menu Class is web bookable or not

iconName.description: Icon Name of the Menu Class

year.description: This value is typically the year of the Wine

salesPrice.description: Price of Menu Item , Numeric currency value field conforming to Currency Format for the selected Property.

itemConsumption.description: Selection of this notes that the price defined is charged 'as-consumed' basis

cateringMenuItemsInfo.description: Response object for retrieving Menu Items.

totalPages.description: Evaluated total page count based on the requested max fetch count.

offset.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

limit.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

totalPages.description: Evaluated total page count based on the requested max fetch count.

offset.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

limit.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

roomTypePoolDetails.description: Response object for fetch room pool information.

roomTypePoolTypes.description: Collection of room type pool and associated room type(s).

roomTypePoolType.description: This type represents complete information of room type pool and Associated Room Type(s).

hotelId.description: Hotel Code where room pool belongs to.

description.description: The description of room pool type.

shortDescription.description: The short description of type room pool.

sequence.description: Sequence for representing room type pool record.

associatedRoomTypes.description: Pertain associated room type(s) detail information.

translationTextType1000.description: Contains Multiple translated texts and language codes.

defaultText.description: Default text with Character length from 0 to 1000.

translatedTexts.description: List of translated text and language codes.

roomPoolRoomTypesType.description: Collection of room type pool mapping type.

roomPoolRoomTypeType.description: This extension will only use for consuming RoomType and SellSequence elements for consistency.

roomClass.description: Room class for the room type code.

activeDate.description: Active date of the room type.

pseudo.description: Indicates if room type is pseudo.

accessible.description: Indicates if room type is accessible.

sendToInterface.description: Indicates if room type is sent to interface.

suite.description: Indicates room type is a suite.

meetingRoom.description: Indicates room type is meeting room. This Can be Meeting room flag cannot be unmarked at the property level. Can only be marked for non pseudo room types.

numberOfRooms.description: Number of rooms for this room type.

inactive.description: Indicates the room type is inactive or not.

restricted.description: Indicates that the room pool cannot be used to allocate inventory to this room type. Inventory must be allocated directly to the room type itself.

roomTypePoolCriteria.description: Request object for creating new room pool.

roomTypePoolToBeChanged.description: Request object for changing existing room pool.

tags.name: ResourceConfig
tags.description: The Resource Config Service Web Service offers capability to configure Master Data needed for Hotel Resources such as managing Inventory Items, Item Pools, Item Classes, etc.

tags.name: ChainConfig
tags.description: These APIs will allow you to configure events related configuration related to Administration.

tags.name: HotelConfig
tags.description: These APIs will allow you to configure events related configuration related to Administration.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Oracle Hospitality
